oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: W. H. H. Terrell correspondence with John T. Wilder, 1863 August 25
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Terrell, W. H. H. (William Henry Harrison), 1827-1884
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Correspondence from Terrell to Wilder referring to Wilder's troop movements around Chattanooga, Tennessee. Letter includes an enclosed clipping from the Indianapolis Daily Journal newspaper recounting Wilder's performance in the Battle of Chattanooga.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Chattanooga, Battle of, Chattanooga, Tenn., 1863; United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865
Rosecrans, William S. (William Starke), 1819-1898; Wilder, John Thomas, 1830-1917; Wood, Thomas J., 1823-1906
United States. Army. Wilder's Brigade
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:spatial: Chattanooga (Tenn.); Cumberland Mountains; Indianapolis (Ind.); Knoxville (Tenn.); Sequatchie River Valley (Tenn.); Tennessee River; Tracy City (Tenn.); Winchester (Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: John T. Wilder military records and correspondence, 1862-1865
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: John T. Wilder Civil War correspondence and papers
